NAME: Composite
DESC: The Composite data type lets you combine the data from any other row or rows, and change it / combine the information and more. It uses underscorejs templates for the templating engine.
compositeHelp2: To output the value from any row, just use the placeholders {{ROW1}}, {{ROW2}}, etc. You cannot refer to the current row - it'll just throw an error.
compositeHelp5: Assuming row 1 and row 2 contain random numbers, the following are examples of some simple math:
compositeHelp6: If row 1 is even, display "even", otherwise display the values from row 2.
